rootElem.name: Segment-DTM
rootElem.purpose: To specify pertinent dates and times

child.name: DTM01
child.purpose: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

savedDerivedCopy.name: DTM01
savedDerivedCopy.purpose: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

savedOrigCopyAtInheritsFrom.name: E374
savedOrigCopyAtInheritsFrom.purpose: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

child.name: DTM02
child.purpose: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

savedDerivedCopy.name: DTM02
savedDerivedCopy.purpose: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

savedOrigCopyAtInheritsFrom.name: E373
savedOrigCopyAtInheritsFrom.purpose: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

child.name: DTM03
child.purpose: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

savedDerivedCopy.name: DTM03
savedDerivedCopy.purpose: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

savedOrigCopyAtInheritsFrom.name: E337
savedOrigCopyAtInheritsFrom.purpose: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

child.name: DTM04
child.purpose: Code identifying the time. In accordance with International Standards Organization standard 8601, time can be specified by a + or - and an indication in hours in relation to Universal Time Coordinate (UTC) time; since + is a restricted character, + and - are substituted by P and M in the codes that follow

savedDerivedCopy.name: DTM04
savedDerivedCopy.purpose: Code identifying the time. In accordance with International Standards Organization standard 8601, time can be specified by a + or - and an indication in hours in relation to Universal Time Coordinate (UTC) time; since + is a restricted character, + and - are substituted by P and M in the codes that follow

savedOrigCopyAtInheritsFrom.name: E623
savedOrigCopyAtInheritsFrom.purpose: Code identifying the time. In accordance with International Standards Organization standard 8601, time can be specified by a + or - and an indication in hours in relation to Universal Time Coordinate (UTC) time; since + is a restricted character, + and - are substituted by P and M in the codes that follow

child.name: DTM05
child.purpose: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

savedDerivedCopy.name: DTM05
savedDerivedCopy.purpose: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

savedOrigCopyAtInheritsFrom.name: E1250
savedOrigCopyAtInheritsFrom.purpose: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

child.name: DTM06
child.purpose: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

savedDerivedCopy.name: DTM06
savedDerivedCopy.purpose: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times
